resources.string: QUIZMASTER
TRUE
FALSE
Denis Ritchie is the creator of the C-language.
C-language is a Mid level language.
Printf is used for printing any statement .
a+b is binary operator.
The default value for static variable is 1.
String is an array of characters.
Do-while loop is an Entry controlled loop.
In C,function overloading is possible.
Volatile is a storage class specifier in C.
Stack data structure is used to handle recursion in C .
Bjarne Stroustrup is invented C++.
C++ is a functional programming language.
.cpp is user defined file extension used in C++ .
Friend Constructor is a type of constructor in C++.
# Symbol is used to declare the preprocessor directive.
Constructor having return type.
Private,Public,Protected are the access specifiers in C++.
C++ uses Bottom-Up approach.
a++ is the pre-increament operator.
::is the scope resolution operator .
Java is a High-level language.
System.out.print is used for printing any statement in java.
String class belong to java.lang .
Java does have the concept of pointers.
Java programming is invented by James Gasling.
JDK is used to Compile,Debug and Execute the java programs.
.java is the extension of Java code.
Void is an access modifier .
There are eight primitive data types in Java.
The size of float and double in Java is 32 and 64 .
